name: create_reminder
description: Creates a new reminder, which cannot be in the past.

title.description: A short description of the reminder.

description.description: An additional description for the reminder.

start_date.description: The scheduled date in `YYYY-MM-DD` format, which cannot be in the past.

end_date.description: The end date for a recurring reminder in `YYYY-MM-DD` format, which must be on or after the `start_date`.

repeat_every_n.description: Number of repeat intervals, defaulting to 0.

repeat_interval_unit.description: The unit for the repeat interval: `MINUTE`, `HOUR`, `DAY`, `WEEK`, `MONTH`, or `YEAR`.

days_of_week.description: A list of days for recurring reminders, with valid values being `SUNDAY`, `MONDAY`, `TUESDAY`, `WEDNESDAY`, `THURSDAY`, `FRIDAY`, and `SATURDAY`.

weeks_of_month.description: Specifies the weeks of the month for recurrence, chosen from: `FIRST`, `SECOND`, `THIRD`, `FOURTH`, and `LAST`.

days_of_month.description: Specifies the days of the month for a recurring reminder, with valid values of `DAY_1` through `DAY_31`, or `LAST` for the final day of the month.

occurrence_count.description: The number of times the reminder should recur.

name: get_reminders
description: Search for reminders using specified criteria and filters.

query.description: A string to search for reminders.

from_date.description: The start date for the filter in `YYYY-MM-DD` format.

from_time_of_day.description: The start time of the filter range in `hh:mm:ss` format.

to_date.description: The end date for the filter, formatted as `YYYY-MM-DD`.

to_time_of_day.description: The end time of the search, formatted as `hh:mm:ss`.

include_completed.description: Specifies whether to include completed reminders.

include_deleted.description: Specifies whether to include deleted reminders.

name: modify_reminder
description: Finds and modifies reminders, requiring at least one of `reminder_ids` or `retrieval_query`.

reminder_ids.description: A list of reminder IDs to modify.

query.description: A search query based on keywords.

from_date.description: The start date for the search query, formatted as `YYYY-MM-DD`.

to_date.description: End date for the query in `YYYY-MM-DD` format.

from_time_of_day.description: The start time for the search range, formatted as `hh:mm:ss`.

to_time_of_day.description: The end time for the search query, formatted as `hh:mm:ss`.

include_completed.description: Whether to include completed reminders in the search.

is_recurring.description: A filter to retrieve recurring reminders only.

retrieval_query.description: A query to find reminders using criteria like `query` (keywords), date/time ranges (`from_date`/`to_date` as YYYY-MM-DD, `from_time_of_day`/`to_time_of_day` as hh:mm:ss), `include_completed`, or `is_recurring`.

completed.description: Whether to mark the reminder(s) as completed.

is_bulk_mutation.description: Indicates whether the operation targets multiple reminders.

title.description: The new title for the specified reminder(s).

start_date.description: The new start date for the reminder, formatted as `YYYY-MM-DD`.

time_of_day.description: New time of day in `hh:mm:ss` format.

am_pm_or_unknown.description: Specifies the time of day as `AM`, `PM`, or `UNKNOWN`.

end_date.description: New end date for recurring reminders in `YYYY-MM-DD` format.

repeat_every_n.description: The numerical value of the repetition interval.

repeat_interval_unit.description: The new time unit for the recurrence interval.

days_of_week.description: A list of new days of the week for recurrence.

weeks_of_month.description: A list of strings defining the new weeks of the month for recurrence.

days_of_month.description: A list of the new days of the month for recurrence.

name: show_matching_reminders
description: Searches for reminders by ID, including deleted items, or by a query that excludes deleted items by default.

reminder_ids.description: A list of specific reminder IDs to show, including deleted reminders.

query.description: A query string for searching by keyword.

from_date.description: The start date for the query, formatted as `YYYY-MM-DD`.

to_date.description: End date for the query in `YYYY-MM-DD` format.

from_time_of_day.description: The start time of day, formatted as `hh:mm:ss`.

to_time_of_day.description: An end time for the search, formatted as `hh:mm:ss`.

include_completed.description: Whether to include completed reminders in the search results.

include_deleted.description: Specifies whether to include deleted reminders in the results, which are excluded by default.

retrieval_query.description: A dictionary of search criteria to find reminders, including keys for `query`, date/time ranges (e.g., `from_date: "YYYY-MM-DD"`), and boolean flags like `include_completed`, `is_recurring`, and `include_deleted`.

name: undo
description: Revert reminder operations using their corresponding operation IDs.

undo_operation_ids.description: A list of operation IDs to undo.
